alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 30 at 3:41AM CDT until March 31 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Wayne, Perry, Greene, Stone and George Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 1 PM this afternoon to 8 PM CDT this evening. For the first Wind Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to midnight CDT tonight. For the second Wind Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
